Header.title: Smart collar,
Header.paragraph: Meet the ultimate dog collar equipped with GPS tracking and a customizable sound system. Train smarter, not harder, with WalkiesTech Smart Collar.

PainPoint.interview: The combination of GPS and distance training capabilities in the Smart Dog Collar could make off-leash walks much safer and stress-free. Excited to see it come to market! "

sta.title: Trouble recalling your dog during off-lead adventures?
sta.text: Our customizable sound system lets you communicate with your dog from a distance, ensuring effective training and control.​

sta.title: Need to keep tabs on your dog's location?​
sta.text: Advanced GPS tracking provides real-time updates on your dog’s whereabouts, enhancing safety and peace of mind.

sta.title: Seeking a smart dog collar that seamlessly integrates luxury and style?
sta.text: WalkiesTech smart collar is where luxurious design seamlessly blends with cutting-edge technology. Elevate your pup's look while ensuring their safety and your peace of mind on every adventure.

Tracking.title: GPS Tracking
Tracking.description: Perfect for long-distance training, our Smart Collar provides you with the tools for effective off-lead training and the peace of mind that comes with knowing your dog's location at all times.

Sound.title: Recall System
Sound.description: With a simple tap, the collar plays a unique sound to call your dog back. Our system supports unlimited customizable sound record.

Health.title: Health Data
Health.description: Am I anxious? Am I happy? Know your dog. Not only the data but also the meaning behind it.
